message.content:
cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CE, cs.ETM 

Reasoning: 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control): The paper proposes a coordinated home energy management system (HEMS) architecture to achieve real-time power balancing, which involves control and optimization of distributed residential units. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The approximate dynamic programming (DP) approaches used to efficiently handle the design problem can be considered as AI techniques. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The approximate DP approaches can also be considered as machine learning techniques. 
- cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science): The economic benefits for the retailer and incentives for the customers to participate in the proposed coordinated HEMS program are given, which involves computational modeling and optimization. 
- cs.ETM (Emerging Technologies): The focus on deferrable appliances, such as Plug-in (Hybrid) Electric Vehicles (PHEV), can be considered as an emerging technology in the context of home energy management.
